objects.text:
• Premium black faux leather construction
• Elegant gold-tone hardware and studs
• Versatile design with adjustable strap

product_details.name: Vintage-Inspired Classic Leather Satchel | Premium Crossbody Bag with Gold Hardware
product_details.description:
• Premium quality black faux leather construction
• Elegant gold-tone hardware and decorative studs
• Versatile design with top handle and adjustable shoulder strap
• Secure front flap closure with magnetic snap buttons
• Structured silhouette perfect for everyday use
• Spacious main compartment for essentials
• Professional and timeless design suitable for work or casual wear
• Durable stitching and reinforced edges for longevity
• Comes with branded hang tag
• Compact yet roomy dimensions ideal for daily essentials
• Multiple compartments for organized storage
• Classic black color that matches any outfit

banner_details:
This banner showcases a premium product display layout for a stylish crossbody bag. The left section of the composition includes multiple text elements: a bold primary heading (`heading`), a refined subheading styled as a tagline (`tagline`), a brief bulleted feature list (`description`), and a prominently styled price label (`price`) in a futuristic font. Below this is a gold call-to-action button with contrasting text (`cta_background` and `cta`). The right side is dominated by a central product image (`product_image`) of a black satchel bag with gold-tone accents. The entire design sits atop a dual-gradient dark background (`background`), segmented vertically and decorated with minimal golden accent lines and dots to add sophistication.

**Color Palette:**
- Rich Black: `#1E1E1E`
- Deep Charcoal: `#2D2D2D`
- Gold: `#D4AF37`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek black handbag, dominated by a deep matte black (#1C1C1C) as the primary color, exuding elegance and sophistication. Gold accents (#D4AF37) are used for the hardware—including the buttons, hooks, and detailing—which contrast sharply with the black and add a touch of luxury. The subtle rose gold tag (#B76E79) introduces a warm metallic hue that complements the gold without clashing. These elements are well-balanced, making the overall design feel clean yet refined. For an advertisement banner, a minimalistic palette of black, gold, rose gold, and soft grey (#E0E0E0) can highlight the handbag’s premium aesthetic.
